responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "D3EF5A8F47648CB24CF35F828F157456", "Are you a healer then? No shortage of need in these ruins. Let\'s get an idea of your skills, can you tie a suture? Much of the first aid that we are called to perform doesn\'t even touch on magic, just good old fashioned know-how. There\'re a few folks around here that I haven\'t seen to yet. Could you take a look? See if you can help out these folks with some basic comforts, water, food, bandages, they all need something...")
name: 0006_P0_Cleric2_41
